column5: Good morning folks, I will be putting the boat in the water this weekend and I will be changing the fluids. I was wondering since I will not have a chance to visit my Yamaha dealer to pick up Yamaha oil will the Nautilis SAE90 gear oil be suitable for the lower unit on a 2005 F90 4 stroke?  Thanks
Did you change the gear oil when you winterized it.  That is when you should change it.  If you did no need to re-change it.
just dont mix synthetic with organic oils....make sure u buy the pump and pump the oil in for the bottom hole
I agree 100%.  OR you can spend twice as much and get the same gear oil in a fancy Yamaha labeled bottle.......
Get amsoil synthetic gear oil. Its good stuff and like $10 a quart.
Been running the Nautilis stuff in my 90 HP Merc for 18 years now with no problems.
